content.raw:
So to use a custom plugin, a user needs to:

1. Add the plugin library to a path known by ign-gazebo (such as a known directory or one given by an env var)
1. Add the plugin to `systems.config` file
1. Refer to the plugin in the `custom.world` file

It looks to me like we could reduce to 2 steps if we embedded all the info needed to load a custom plugin to the world file.

And to allow them to remove default plugins, we need to remove the hardcoded list from the code.

(note that I'm not saying we need to address all this in this PR, but I just wanted to make sure we're on the same page)
